## Summary
This draft consolidates 3 validated perspectives into one bounded narrative [@cid_alpha].

## Key Findings
- Throughput improved by 18% after enforcing deterministic checkpoints [@cid_beta].
- Review convergence stayed within 4 iteration slots [@cid_gamma].

## Evidence
All cited claims map to validated or paywalled citations in the pool [@cid_alpha] [@cid_beta] [@cid_gamma].

## Caveats
The fixture validates structure and citation hygiene, not online retrieval variability [@cid_alpha].
